desc: Artisan goods handcrafted by women changing the world. All proceeds from your purchase funds women founding micro-enterprises around the world.

layout.text: Shop the Desert Sanctuary Core Collection

Inspired by the story of Tirzah and designed collaboratively to reflect the power of sisterhood to change the world. This collection embodies the story of Tirzah from the old testament, channeling the powerful legacy and sun kissed legend of five sisters who advocated for one another and changed history for women until this day.
